dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S89 IS: Financial Takeover Repeal Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Vitter introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To repeal the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Financial Takeover Repeal Act of 2015.

The Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (Public Law 111â€“203) is repealed, and the provisions of law amended by such Act are revived or restored as if such Act had not been enacted.
